description: An improper authentication vulnerability in FSSO Collector version 5.0.295 and below may allow an unauthenticated user to bypass a FSSO firewall policy and access the protected network via sending specifically crafted UDP login notification packets.

product.name: Fortinet FSSO Windows DC Agent, FSSO Windows CA

enisaIdProduct.product_version: FSSO Windows DC Agent 5.0.295, 5.0.294; FSSO Windows CA 5.0.295, 5.0.294
